pageContext.collection_title: B0443, University of the State of New York. Board of Regents. Secretary.
pageContext.collection_description: Audiotapes of convocations and Education Department functions, 1952-1970.
pageContext.collection_notes: These audio tapes seem more likely to have been used for internal NYSED purposes, but it is conceivable that some of them may have been broadcast via radio.
